trans-unit.source: The `Get-DscConfigurationStatus` cmdlet gets information about configuration status from a target node.
trans-unit.target: `Get-DscConfigurationStatus` Cmdlet 會從目標節點取得設定狀態的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: A rich object is returned that includes high-level information about whether or not the configuration run was successful or not.
trans-unit.target: 高級物件已傳回，此物件包含關於設定是否順利執行的高等級資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can dig into the object to discover details about the configuration run such as:
trans-unit.target: 您可以深入了解此物件，以探索有關設定執行的詳細資料，例如︰

trans-unit.source: All of the resources that failed
Any resource that requested a reboot
trans-unit.target: 要求重新開機的任何資源

trans-unit.source: Meta-Configuration settings at time of configuration run
trans-unit.target: 在設定執行時中繼設定的設定

trans-unit.source: The following parameter set returns the status information for the last configuration run:
trans-unit.target: 下列的參數集傳回上次設定執行時的狀態資訊︰

trans-unit.source: The following parameter set returns the status information for all previous configuration runs:
trans-unit.target: 下列的參數集傳回所有先前設定執行時的狀態資訊︰
